statements: SELECT * FROM customer_churn;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_churn;
SELECT customer_id, churn_date FROM customer_churn;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, churn_reason FROM customer_churn;
SELECT * FROM customer_churn ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_churn WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_churn WHERE churn_reason = 'Service Disatisfaction' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_churn WHERE churn_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, email, churn_reason FROM customer_churn WHERE churn_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY churn_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, churn_date, churn_reason FROM customer_churn WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE subscription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ChurnFactors ORDER BY factor_id DESC;
SELECT description, factor_name FROM ChurnFactors WHERE impact_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE subscription_date = '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM ChurnFactors WHERE impact_level = 'High';
SELECT factor_id, factor_name FROM ChurnFactors WHERE factor_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY subscription_date DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, churn_status FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE signup_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE customers.churn_status = FALSE;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, product_name FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transactions.transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE signup_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1,3,5);
SELECT customer_name, signup_date FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
